title: Change Into a Black Cat!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Rin-chan, have you decided on what you will wear for the Halloween party?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin will dress up as a ghost!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Is that so, I was wondering if you would be a black cat or something like that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>See, you love cats, right, Rin-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>A black cat.... It’s cute, but.... Rin will probably be a ghost!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I see.... I brought black cat ears that I used for my part-time job at the maid store though.... I think they will really suit you though, Rin-chan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh!? Is that so? C-, can Rin try them a little bit?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>You’ll wear them!? I’m so happy! Then, stay put for a little bit, okay~ ....There, it’s on. I think it really suits you and looks really cute, Rin-chan! I’ll be happy if you wear them. Can’t you dress up as both a ghost and a black cat....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>....Rin wants to try dressing up as a black cat too nya-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
